title: NFL ATL: Offseason expectations, post-Super Bowl headlines
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Offseason expectations, post-Super Bowl headlines
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- meet the offseason head-on, diving straight into post-Super Bowl headlines and analyzing the season to come.  Don’t miss which teams the heroes believe will have the most intriguing spring and summer, as well as which Super Bowl contender has the best chance of returning next year.  Who should you be expecting to make the leap from pretenders to contenders in 2014?  Tune in and join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
